title: Infernal Diana skin bug
body: As I was playing The legend of the poro king as Diana, I had my infernal skin equipped. As I was playing I noticed the bug after I bought Banshees veil and Zhonyas. When I used zhyonas diana was a orb of fire, I ulted after zhyonas and I just turned into an orb. Throughout the second half of the game I couldn't ult half the time and I stayed as an orb even after dying.

replies.body: Hey Jarebear1414, thanks for the report! Did you have Snowball equipped, or was there an enemy Lulu in the game? I think this may be an issue with Polymorph-style abilities. D:

Hey! Thanks for replying! But I looked it up and found a video on YouTube and the guy was saying that it happened to him when he was snared by Jihn mid ult and that's exactly what I was doing at the time it happened.
Gotcha, thanks for the additional context!
